betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]Industrial Alchemy Tower[/quest]

§6Machine Type: §aThaumatorium§r

§c2/4§r Overclock per Voltage Tier, starting at §aIV§r

Uses Infusion Provider for required Essentia

Multi does between §c1-243§r parallels depending on which tier of Essentia Diffusion Cell you use for the casing (§c4§r tiers in total)

For optimal speeds, needs Stabilized Energized Nodes for the following aspects: §6Aer§r, §6Ignis§r, §6Ordo§r, §6Perditio§r.

Best way to get them is to make a pure node using Essentia Shards with the following method:

Place an Essentia Shard next to a Vis Relay near your centivis setup.

Right click Essentia Shard with Ethereal Essence for desired aspect. §c1§r Essence = §c4§r of that aspect

When you reach the desired amount of aspect (different for each aspect), jar the Shard in the same way you would jar a node.

Release jarred node onto one of the Tower's 4 Node Stabilizers and activate with a Redstone Block on top of the Node Transducer.

Getting the amount of §c10§r for the final Stabilized note depends on which aspect.

§6Aer§r = §c140§r
§6Ignis§r = §c120§r
§6Ordo§r = §c140§r
§6Perditio§r = §c120§r

§dQuest added by Vindrake§r
